titleStmt.title: The historie of the vvorld: commonly called, The naturall historie of C. Plinius Secundus. Translated into English by Philemon Holland Doctor of Physicke. The first [-second] tome
Naturalis historia. English
titleStmt.author: Pliny, the Elder.
Holland, Philemon, 1552-1637.

notesStmt.note: First word of titles is xylographic.
With a final "advertisement" to the reader; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
